message:
"Shatters and Sirens"

Blue light weaves tales, life concedes,
On Morville Heath no zealot leads.
Fragile whispers of Skoda's song,
In collision's dance, where do we belong?
Death, a guest uninvited, feeds,
Yet life, refracted, still proceeds.
prompt: Two die in collision involving police vehicle in Shropshire Two people have died and two others sustained injuries after a crash involving a police vehicle in Shropshire. A man in his 60s who was driving a Skoda Octavia and a woman passenger in her 50s died at the scene in Morville Heath on Saturday, West Mercia police said. A woman in her 20s who was also in the car sustained minor injuries. The driver of
